item.title: Israel says it has recovered the bodies of 2 hostages
item.description: The bodies of Judy Weinstein Haggai, 70, an Israeli who held U.S. and Canadian citizenship, and her husband, Gad Haggai, 72, a dual U.S.-Israeli citizen, were recovered, the country's military said.

item.title: 3 World War II bombs are defused in a German city's biggest postwar evacuation
item.description: More than 20,000 residents were evacuated from Cologne's city center Wednesday after the bombs were unearthed on Monday during preparatory work for road construction.
